Package possportstore

Class StoreSystem

java.lang.Object
possportstore.StoreSystem
public class StoreSystem extends Object
Main Controller (Facade) for the Application.

This class coordinates interactions between the UI, the User Manager, the Sale Manager, and the Inventory system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StoreSystem()
    Initializes the StoreSystem, loads resources, and prepares sub-managers.

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(String username, String password, User.Role role)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      username - The new username.
      password - The new password.
      role - The user role.
      Returns:
      true if successful.

      Updates an existing user.
      Parameters:

      u - The new username.
      p - The new password.
      r - The new role.
      Returns:
      true if successful.

    • addProduct

      public boolean addProduct(Product p)
      Adds a new product to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      p - The product to add.
      Returns:
      true if added successfully, false if inventory is full.

    • findProductById

      public Product findProductById(String idProduct)
      Finds a product by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      idProduct - The ID to search for.
      Returns:
      The Product if found, null otherwise.

    • searchProduct

      public Product searchProduct(String search)
      Searches for a product by ID or Name (case insensitive).
      Parameters:
      search - The search query.
      Returns:
      The Product if found, null otherwise.

    • updateProductStock

      public boolean updateProductStock(String idProduct, int newStock)
      Updates the stock of a specific product.
      Parameters:
      idProduct - The ID of the product.
      newStock - The new stock quantity.
      Returns:
      true if updated, false if product not found.

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct(String idProduct)
      Deletes a product from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      idProduct - The ID of the product to delete.
      Returns:
      true if deleted, false if not found.

    • finalizeSale

      public Sale.Invoice finalizeSale(CurrentSale cart)
      Finalizes the current sale transaction. Updates stock, creates invoice with discounts, and saves data.
      Parameters:
      cart - The current shopping cart.
      Returns:
      The generated Sale.Invoice, or null if cart is empty.

    • processReturn

      public boolean processReturn(int invoiceId, String productId, int quantityToReturn)
      Process a return for a specific product. Increases the inventory stock for the returned item, updates the invoice, and persists the changes.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The ID of the invoice containing the item.
      productId - The ID of the product being returned.
      quantityToReturn - The quantity to return to stock.
      Returns:
      true if the product was found and updated, false otherwise.

    • getTotalInvoicesCount

      public int getTotalInvoicesCount()
      Gets the total number of invoices in the system.
      Returns:
      The total invoice count.

    • getTotalSalesRevenue

      public double getTotalSalesRevenue()
      Calculates the total revenue from all sales, including VAT.
      Returns:
      The total revenue as a double.

    • countLowStockProducts

      public int countLowStockProducts()
      Counts the number of products with low stock (<= 5).
      Returns:
      The count of low stock items.

    • getLowStockProducts

      public Product[] getLowStockProducts()
      Retrieves the specific list of products with low stock.
      Returns:
      Array of products with stock <= 5.

    • getTotalUnitsInStock

      public int getTotalUnitsInStock()
      Calculates the total number of units in inventory.
      Returns:
      The total unit count.
